models Package¶

baseModel Module¶

fla.gr base model with a few classmethods and such to help
keep a general interface across all models

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

class models.baseModel.baseCouchModel(**kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Extension of the couchdb-python Document class to provide a bit more of an object interface with the documents, since some things such as saving and deleteing the documents doesn’t feel very object based to me.

delete()¶

Deletes the current instance

classmethod find(value)¶

Searches couchdb for documents that have the requested username

Parameters:value – The value to search for in the ORM
Returns:Either a cls instance or a list of cls instances if a result or multiple have been found. None if no user is found
classmethod findWithView(view, value)¶

Searches couchdb for documents that have the requested username

Parameters:value – The value to search for in the ORM
Returns:Either a cls instance or a list of cls instances if a result or multiple have been found. None if no user is found
classmethod getAll(view, key=None)¶

Returns either all of the documents under view, or all of the documents which match the key :param view: The name of the view to use, currently this is the name of the

couchdb view, however it can be extended into other areas later on if I ever change the underlying database.
Parameters:key – Optional view key to use
Returns:A list of ORM instances which fall within the given view
classmethod getByID(ID)¶

If you already know the id of the document you want, then just call this and it’ll return that document

Parameters:ID – The document id of the document you want to retrieve
Returns:An instance of cls which has the matching document id
classmethod new(**kwargs)¶
save()¶

Simply a shortcut for saving the document to couch
